dw:transform-message.doc:name: Set API Fields
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.type_organisatie')) : flowVars.type_organisatie, street : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.postadres.straat, number : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.postadres.huisnummer, zipcode : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.postadres.postcode, city : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.postadres.gemeente, email : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.algemeen_emailadres, telephone : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.algemeen_telefoonnummer, website : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.website, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.facturatie_emailadres')) : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.facturatie_emailadres, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.bestelbonnen')) : "1" when (flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.werkt_uw_organisatie_met_bestelbonnen_voor_de_facturatie.selectedOption == "ja") otherwise "0" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: OK - Update Comment
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.comment_intentieverklaring')) : flowVars.comment_value }

scripting:component.doc:name: crm_dragers_string_comma_new to payload
crm_golf_string_comma_new to payload

dw:transform-message.doc:name: set payload for http call
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.analoge_dragers')) : flowVars.crm_dragers_string_comma_new, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.golf')) : flowVars.crm_golf_string_comma_new }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 1- ITV - process - opgestuurd naar CP (proces ITV opgestart)
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.pending'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.actief')) : "", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : "", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "0" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 7 - SEO -process - getekend opgeladen door VIAA
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.ja'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.actief')) : p('teamleader.company.actief.nee'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.comment_intentieverklaring')) : "", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "1", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.samenwerkingsovereenkomst')) : "1" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 8 - SA - process - opstarten proces
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.actief')) : p('teamleader.company.actief.ja') }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 9 - SA - process - getekend opgeladen en goedgekeurd door VIAA
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.actief')) : p('teamleader.company.actief.ja'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.service_agreement')) : "1" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 2 - ITV - Milestone "Geen interesse"
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.nee'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring.ingevuld'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "0" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 3 - ITV - Milestone "Misschien later samenwerking"
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.pending'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring.pending'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "0" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 4 - ITV - Milestone "Akkoord en opstart"
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.ja'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring.ingevuld'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.comment_intentieverklaring')) : "", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "1" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 5 - ITV - Milestone "Akkoord, geen opstart"
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.ja'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring.ingevuld'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.comment_intentieverklaring')) : "", ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "0" }

when.expression: #[flowVars.'x-skryv-event' == 'milestone' && flowVars.action == 'reached' && flowVars.milestone_key == 'IntermediateThrowEvent_DS_ITV_interesse_nietakkoordSWO' && flowVars.milestone_status == 'Interesse, niet akkoord SWO']

dw:transform-message.doc:name: 6 - ITV - Milestone "Interesse, niet akkoord met SWO"
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", company_id : flowVars.company_id, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.cp_status')) : p('teamleader.company.cp_status.pending'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring')) : p('teamleader.company.intentieverklaring.pending'), ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.company.toestemming_starten')) : "0" }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Set API Fields
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), track_changes : "1", forename : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.gegevens_directie.voornaam, surname : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.gegevens_directie.naam_1, email : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.gegevens_directie.email, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.contact.functiecategorie')) : flowVars.functie_categorie, ("custom_field_" ++ p('teamleader.contact.relatie_met_viaa')) : p('teamleader.contact.relatie_met_viaa.contactpersoon_contract') }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Set API Fields
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { api_group : p('teamleader.api_group'), api_secret : p('teamleader.api_secret'), contact_id : flowVars.contact_id, company_id : flowVars.company_id, mode : "link", function : flowVars.adres_en_contactgegevens.gegevens_directie.functietitel }
